From what you've learned about Ray, what wearable should be your lead offer?

Samsung Gear S

TIMEX IRONMAN ONE GPS+

Moto 360

Close...

 

The Gear S has a lot of features that could match with Ray's lifestyle. But, Ray prefers stay unplugged from calls on his runs and is usually at his desk during the day. Remember that Gear S works with compatible Galaxy Gear smartphones, and Ray has an iPhone. TIMEX IRONMAN ONE GPS+ is the better option for Ray.

Right on!

 

Ray is clearly a committed runner and TIMEX IRONMAN ONE GPS+ was created with people like him in mind. Ray can monitor his speed and distance and listen to his music, all without bringing his phone.

Nope...

 

Ray prefers not to bring his phone when he runs and he gets most of his notifications at his desk during the day. Moto 360 needs to pair with a phone, so it probably won’t be the best fit for his needs.

 

Recall that Ray has an iPhone, so Android Wear won’t be a good match. The TIMEX IRONMAN ONE GPS+ is the better option for Ray.
